fn.p: Supplementary information is available in the online version of the paper.

Author contributions: JJW, JFL, DTS and RAS conceived the study. All other co-authors conducted the model simulations. RAS processed model output and estimated human mortality. RAS and JJW analyzed results. RAS and JJW prepared the manuscript and all co-authors commented on it.
Competing Financial Interests: All authors declare that they do not have any competing financial interests.
